Articles.Content: No KSP Weekly this week? I look forward to these each week. I just got home from work to see, nope. Nothing. Whats the deal ?
whats the number for 911?!?!
Theres apparently some sort of unannounced media blackout...for some reason. No one really knows why. Get out your tinfoil hat and have fun guessing as to why.
Get the tinfoil, guys... Kerbals are coming.
guys....im scared.... what if skelingtons are real?
No comment
OH NO! Jeb broke KSP again!

We...

We have to do something...

QUICK! POST HIGH RESOLUTION PICTURES OF BREAD!

QUICK! POST HIGH RESOLUTION PICTURES OF BREAD!

Uhhhh.... Ok...

Or...
^^^^ this kind
Mmm... Yummy in my Tummy. Maybe a slice of fresh baked nut bread would motivate the devs to post an update

Mmm... Yummy in my Tummy. Maybe a slice of fresh baked nut bread would motivate the devs to post an update

i think this man may be on to something!

i think this man may be on to something!

Get jeb to fire up the engines! We got some bakin' to do!

5 of May is a huge holiday in Mexico, right? Maybe they really are close to releasing 0.20, and working like demons to get it out before holiday? I so hope its true...Anyways, let's wait until 5th before getting really worried.
The US government has sacked the devs for fear that the North Koreans will use KSP to train their own people in the creation of ICBMs.

Uhhhh.... Ok...

-snip of hi-res inside of bread-

Dat carbon dioxide holes.

Anyway, thread is starting to derail. Please stay on-topic to avoid closure of thread.

Lol we are the most over reactive community ever known.

But I suppose with all of the forum nonsense the poor devs have had a lot of strain on themselves, so no one can blame them.

But we are all secretly hoping that they are not telling us anything because they are nearing a new release

Edited May 1, 2013 by tom1499
For a reason. This game is very dear to me - it lets me realise my childhood fantasies about exploring strange, new worlds. Even on computer's screen it means a lot.

Lol we are the most over reactive community ever known.

But I suppose with all of the forum nonsense the poor devs have had a lot of strain on themselves, so no one can blame them.

But we are all secretly hoping that they are not telling us anything because they are nearing a new release

If so, this will be the shortest time between two releases in history!

If so, this will be the shortest time between two releases in history!

Not anymore, 0.19 was a month ago, remember? It's been more than a month.

Yeah, I am kind of curious about the no weekly update as well...especially since now it is two in a row missed...though I'd certainly give a pass for missing last weeks with the several day long effort to restore the forums.
Also no official live steam this week

No nothing this week until now.

If they would tell us what is going on, it wouldn't be that bad.

Theres apparently some sort of unannounced media blackout...for some reason. No one really knows why. Get out your tinfoil hat and have fun guessing as to why.
I've heard there's a lot of problems going on in management.
Not anymore, 0.19 was a month ago, remember? It's been more than a month.

Yeah they crapped out with the "monthly updates" already, couldn't even manage ONE.

I've heard there's a lot of problems going on in management.

From whom within Squad, exactly? What factual basis is there for this claim? Or is this more baseless pot stirring?
